availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Edwin J. Martin (Campbell County, Kentucky, resident. )

body.p: Campbell County, Kentucky, resident. Native of England. Married to Mary J. Martin. Father of Ann E. Martin and Emanuel Martin. Resident of Campbell County in 1860. Signed a petition to Beriah Magoffin as a Kenton County resident in the early 1860s.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, Newport, p. 620.
KYR-0001-020-1453.
